verses.roman:
purañjayasya putro 'bhūd
anenās tat-sutaḥ pṛthuḥ
viśvagandhis tataś candro
yuvanāśvas tu tat-sutaḥ

synonyms: purañjayasya—of Purañjaya; putraḥ—son; abhūt—was born; anenāḥ—by the name Anenā; tat-sutaḥ—his son; pṛthuḥ—of the name Pṛthu; viśvagandhiḥ—of the name Viśvagandhi; tataḥ—his son; candraḥ—by the name Candra; yuvanāśvaḥ—of the name Yuvanāśva; tu—indeed; tat-sutaḥ—his son.
translation: The son of Purañjaya was known as Anenā, Anenā's son was Pṛthu, and Pṛthu's son was Viśvagandhi. Viśvagandhi's son was Candra, and Candra's son was Yuvanāśva.
